title: Interpretation of a derivative at a specific time

content.prompt: For t ≥ 0 hours, H is a differentiable function of t that gives the temperature, in degrees Celsius, at an Arctic weather station. Which of the following is the best interpretation of H ′ ( 24 ) ?

choices.label: The change in temperature during the first day
The change in temperature during the 24th hour
The average rate at which the temperature changed during the 24th hour
The rate at which the temperature is changing during the first day
The rate at which the temperature is changing at the end of the 24th hour

topic.text: 4.1: Interpreting the Meaning of the Derivative in Context

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Identify an appropriate mathematical rule or procedure based on the relationship between concepts (e.g., rate of change and accumulation) or processes (e.g., differentiation and its inverse process, anti-differentiation) to solve problems.
